game.name: Race.a.bit
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Partial Controller Support, Stats, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A retro racing on crazy tracks – completely in the style of 8 and 16-bit classics. Enjoy the reinterpretation of old-school gameplay in combination with perfect controls and the driving beats of unique artist Bit Shifter!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A retro racing on crazy tracks – completely in the style of 8 and 16-bit classics. Enjoy the reinterpretation of old-school gameplay in combination with perfect controls and the driving beats of unique artist Bit Shifter!
